parameters.name: CertId
parameters.description: The certificate ID. This parameter is required and valid only when **CertType** is set to **cas**. If you specify this parameter, an existing certificate is used.

parameters.name: CertName
parameters.description: The name of the new certificate. You can specify only one certificate name. This parameter is optional and valid only when **CertType** is set to **upload**.

parameters.name: CertRegion
parameters.description: The region of the SSL certificate. This parameter takes effect only when **CertType** is set to **cas**. Default value: **cn-hangzhou**. Valid values: **cn-hangzhou** and **ap-southeast-1**.

parameters.name: CertType
parameters.description:
The type of the certificate. Valid values:

*   **upload**: a user-uploaded SSL certificate.
*   **cas**: a certificate that is acquired through Certificate Management Service.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name that is secured by the SSL certificate.

parameters.name: SSLPri
parameters.description: The private key. Specify the private key only if you want to enable the SSL certificate.

parameters.name: SSLProtocol
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the SSL certificate. Valid values:

*   **on**
*   **off**

parameters.name: SSLPub
parameters.description: The content of the SSL certificate. Specify the content of the SSL certificate only if you want to enable the SSL certificate.
